attributes.action: Ban images of Sexual objectification on printed media available for all to see
attributes.additional_details:
Sexual Objectification is NOT okay.
Please read this article: https://www.theodysseyonline.com/sexual-objectification-media
attributes.background: Demeaning nude pictures of Women are printed on front covers of Magazines and Newspapers everyday. Sending negative messages to men, women, children and adolescents. Affecting self-esteem, mental health and influences society to produce a hypersexualised culture of victim blaming and body shaming.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Ban images of Sexual objectification on printed media available for all to see".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
